dublin_core.dcvalue: Jafary Liana, Senior Technical Advisor, MSH Tanzania, Email: jliana@msh.org

Working with MSH and PCT, ITIDO developed mobile applications that link to a web-based database of information on private sector drug outletsâ€™ premises and personnel and which include a mobile payment component for premises and personnel fees, an SMS-based reporting module for outlets to report on standard indicators related to service delivery, and an SMS-based information exchange module, which allows ADDO and pharmacy personnel to send and receive information, for example, on accreditation requirements or drug recalls.
Made available in DSpace on 2020-10-14T10:19:07Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 1 accredited_drug_dispensing_outlet.pdf: 199657 bytes, checksum: e52c61adf9747526420800f5543c03fc (MD5)
